resources.string:
The rules of the game: Before you will be 3 pictures, two below and one above. In two of them there will be numbers. You need to make sure that the sum of the numbers from the two bottom pictures is the same as the number on the top picture.

 For example, if the number 7 is on the top picture, and a question mark is on one of the bottom pictures and the number 4 is on the other, we must understand that the number 3 should be in the place of the question mark, because 3 + 4 = 7.

 Your task is to find the correct number so that the sum is correct!"
Correct answers are %s out of %s needed
The required percentage of correct answers: %s
The required number of correct answers: %s
